mapper.select: select u.name, cp.center_name , cp.exercise, (select avg(r.rating) from review r where r.target_id=tp.trainer_id) as rating, (select count(r.review_idx) from review r where r.target_id=tp.trainer_id) as cnt, (select file_name from profile_file pf where pf.user_id = tp.trainer_id) as file_name, (select min(price) from product p where p.trainer_id = tp.trainer_id) as min_price, (select concat('[',group_concat(concat('"',t.tag_name,'"')),']') from user_tag ut join tag t on ut.tag_idx=t.tag_idx where ut.user_id=tp.trainer_id) as tags from user u join trainer_profile tp on tp.trainer_id = u.user_id join center_profile cp on cp.center_idx = tp.center_idx where u.user_level = 2 and BINARY tp.trainer_id like concat('%',#{param1},'%') limit 5 offset #{param2}

select cp.center_name, cp.address, (select avg(r.rating) from review r where r.target_id = cp.center_id)as rating, (select count(r.review_idx) from review r where r.target_id = cp.center_id)as cnt, (select file_name from profile_file pf where pf.user_id=cp.center_id) as file_name, (select min(price) from product p where p.center_id = cp.center_id)as price, (select concat('[',group_concat(concat('"',t.tag_name,'"')) ,']') from user_tag ut join tag t on ut.tag_idx = t.tag_idx where ut.user_id = cp.center_id)as tags from user u join center_profile cp on u.user_id = cp.center_id where u.user_level = 3 and binary cp.center_id like concat('%',#{param1},'%') limit 5 offset #{param2}
